message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this great product to you today. I think it would be perfect for you and I'm confident you'll find it valuable.  I'm asking for $200, which is a fair price considering its quality and features.
I'm really interested in the product, but $200 is a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $120 for it. Can we meet in the middle?
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  While $200 represents the true value of this product, I'm willing to come down to $170 for you. I'm confident you won't find a better deal elsewhere.
I appreciate you coming down to $170, but I'm still a bit short. I'm willing to pay $140 for the product. Can we meet somewhere in the middle?
